sentences: Christopher Juel Barriere (July 11, 1972 â€“ November 10, 2016), professionally known as 3-2, was an American rapper from Houston, Texas.
He was a member of southern hip hop groups Convicts, Blac Monks, Southside Playaz and Screwed Up Click.
He achieved success by his time with Rap-A-Lot Records.
Barriere was fatally shot in the head at a gas station in Houston.
